General.Name: Groupe LDLC
General.Description: Groupe LDLC société anonyme operates as an online IT and high-tech equipment retailer. It operates retail brands and e-commerce websites, as well as a chain of brand stores and franchises. The company was formerly known as LDLC.com SA and changed its name to Groupe LDLC société anonyme in October 2016. Groupe LDLC société anonyme was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Limonest, France.
